BuyerGroupPricebook.name: BuyerGroupPricebook
BuyerGroupPricebook.description: Represents a buyer group price book used in Lightning B2B Commerce.

BuyerGroupId.description: The ID of the buyer group that the price book record is assigned to.

IsActive.description: Determines whether the BuyerGroupPricebook is active (true) or not (false). Default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the Buyer Group Price Book record.

Pricebook2Id.description: The ID of the price book assigned to the buyer group.

Priority.description: The sequential priority used to determine the price of a product. This field is only available for web stores that use the Priority pricing strategy.
